tool_description: Modifies existing orders by changing price, quantity, or other parameters while maintaining order priority when possible.

venue_order_id.description: Venue order ID of the order to modify

connection_id.description: Active connection identifier for the venue

new_time_in_force.description: New time in force: day, gtc, ioc, fok

error_messages: Order not modifiable: Order is in a state that cannot be modified (filled, cancelled, rejected).
Invalid modification: New parameters violate venue rules or regulatory requirements.
Connection invalid: Connection ID is not active or has expired.
Modification rejected: Venue rejected the modification request.
No changes specified: At least one parameter (price, quantity, or time_in_force) must be provided.
usage: Provide venue_order_id and connection_id along with at least one parameter to modify. Not all venues support all modification types.

modification_status.description: Modification result: accepted, rejected, or pending

new_order_id.description: New order ID if modification created a replacement order
